      • getStats

        public static java.util.Map<java.util.UUID,java.lang.Integer> getStats(StatsStorage.StatisticType stat)
        Get all UUID's sorted ascending by Statistic Type
        Parameters:
        stat - Statistic type to get (kills, deaths etc.)
        Returns:
        Map of UUID keys and Integer values sorted in ascending order of requested statistic type
